body_html: @ebrevdo - I'll think about it. I do have a translator that works pretty similar to this one but creates cells through a separate class that allows for inserting bidirectional layers where you want, residuals where you want, merging inputs with concat vs. sum, and a few other things. I think I could migrate my class over to this tutorial pretty easily by using static RNN's. I'll let you know.
